I Purple You Army 💜

summary: BTS Reaction-The members take care of Jimin 🤴🏻👏🏻
body:
BTS Reaction-The members take care of Jimin 🤴🏻👏🏻

How each member would take care of Jimin when he is sick 🤢🤧

Jin

would get up at all hours of the day to make food he knew would either make Jimin better or would at least make him smile. He asked the doctor if there was anything specific to cook that would make him better and Jin would cook it for him. Jin would sometime stir in Jimins medicine if he was making soup as a sneaky way to trick Jimin as he knew Jimin hated taking medicine.

Yoongi

would act like he didn’t noticed jimin was sick at first but would secretly brings blankets to him and keep checking to see if he’s ok. He would offer to drive Jimin to see the doctor and pay for any medicine he needed. He would make sure to tell Jimin that he loved him as he knew Jimin loved hearing those words especially from Yoongi who keeps his emotions to his chest.

Namjoon

being the leader, Namjoon knew he had to take care of jimin and knew the best thing for him to do was to keep checking on him and giving him lots of cuddles as Jimins mum and dad couldn’t be there. He knew if you gave Jimin cuddles it would calm him down and it would put him to sleep which he needed to do. Namjoon also made sure that jimin didn’t leave his room as he needed rest.

Hoseok

Hobi made sure Jimin was wrapped up well as Jimin insisted on carrying out his schedule. Hobi would wrap his coat round Jimin for extra warmness and he knew Jimin felt the cold more than any of the other members. He would also bring him hot packs and place them over his body, as soon as jimin had finish his parts, hobi would make sure jimin went straight home and would often ride with him to make sure of that.

Taehyung

would stay by Jimins side until he knew he was better. He would always be singing to Jimin, talking to him and telling him jokes to make him smile. He would show jimin all of Armies love on twitter and he knew this would make Jimin feel loved and abit more happier. He would often bring Jimin his medicine and made sure that he took it and V was also concerned whenever any member was sick.

Jungkook

very much like V he would take it in turns to watch Jimin. He would often do impressions of the members to make jimin laugh. They would talk about adventures to go on for GCF when jimin was better and look back at the old footage from their trip before. Jungkook would also get jimin what ever he wanted and bring it to him straight away. He would make sure Jimin was nicely tucked up in bed and would mimic Jimins mum tucking him in to make jimin laugh.

summary:
SPEEDPAINT Happy Birthday to Jung Hoseok, a.k.a J-Hope from BTS !

 I really wanted to draw something for his birthday because...
caption:
SPEEDPAINT

Happy Birthday to Jung Hoseok, a.k.a J-Hope from BTS !

I really wanted to draw something for his birthday because it means a lot to me.

I haven’t been a part of the BTS fandom for a long time, only a few months for now, but they managed to become a big part of my life in such a short amount of time.
I’ve been going through a lot of struggles at the end of 2018, but I was able to keep my head up thanks to those seven men, and mostly Hoseok.

I really love Hobi’s very bright personality, he always manages to put a smile on my face no matter how down I feel.
I also think he is my very first celebrity crush, but heh, I’m not that kinda of fan who spend most of the time dreaming about being in a relationship with him and absolutly trying to get his attention. All I want is to see him happy, and I guess this is what being in love is supposed to be.

Anyway, I hope you like it.
